title: Pilot
description: Four episodes are remakes of the original episodes from the original "Alfred Hitchcock Presents" series. In the first, "Incident In A Small Jail", a mild-mannered traveling businessman is pulled over for speeding in a small town where he is locked up in a jail with a murder suspect which takes another turn when a vigilante mob lays siege to the place. In "Man From The South" a gambler in Las Vegas accepts a bet with a mysterious old southern man, that he can light his cigarette lighter 10 times and if he misses one light, the man from the south will chop off the gambler's little finger on his right hand. In "Bang! You're Dead!" a little girl takes her visiting uncle's .38 caliber revolver and goes around pointing it at people and yelling "bang" in which she eventually loads with real bullets. In "An Unlocked Window" two nurses spend a terrifying night in a secluded large house in the country while there's a serial killer on the loose.

title: Revenge
description: A man's outrage over the attack on his unstable bride triggers an uncanny series of events.

title: Night Fever
description: A cop-killer shot while robbing a liquor store tries to charm a nurse into helping him escape.

title: Wake Me When I'm Dead
description: A prosecutor hypnotizes a murder suspect to prove his case.

title: Final Escape
description: A jailed killer needs a gravedigger's help.

title: The Night Caller
description: A young divorcée must deal with an ogler and an obscene caller.

title: Method Actor
description: Alcoholic film star Paul Dano loses a great role to young Lance Richards, then fatally injuries Lance when he visits Paul for advice on how to play the role.

title: The Human Interest Story
description: A man claiming to be from another solar system warns of an imminent invasion via television.

title: Breakdown
description: After arranging the arrest of a drug and weapons trafficker, a corrupt businessman is paralyzed in a car accident and taken to the morgue while in South America.

title: Prisoners
description: A housewife befriends an escaped convict.

title: Arthur, or the Gigolo
description: A man upsets his bride's feline friends.

title: The Gloating Place
description: Real terror awaits a gawky teen who feigns an assault.

title: The Right Kind of Medicine
description: An alcoholic doctor gives a wounded bank robber a prescription.

title: Beast in View
description: A psychiatrist who is getting married receives threatening phone calls.

title: A Very Happy Ending
description: A bitter son blackmails a hit man to kill his wealthy father.

title: The Canary Sedan
description: A woman travels to Hong Kong to be with her husband who is haunted by the spirit of a woman he had an affair with years before.

title: Enough Rope for Two
description: A man's girlfriend invites her unstable cousin to join their weekend camping trip.

title: The Creeper
description: A fashion designer thinks a serial killer has the keys to her apartment.

title: Happy Birthday
description: A man's quiet 50th birthday is interrupted when he is arrested for a murder from 22 years before.

title: The Jar
description: A suffering artist finds a mysterious jar and decides to incorporate it into his exhibition. It's a enormous success, but it also causes problems around the household.

title: Deadly Honeymoon
description: A woman learns her new husband is suspected of killing his first two wives for insurance money to cover his gambling debts.

title: Four O'Clock
description: A vengeful judge sets a lethal trap for his cheating wife and her lover.

title: Road Hog
description: A road hog antagonizes a wildcatter.

title: The Initiation
description: A fraternity prank backfires.

title: Conversation Over a Corpse
description: Two women will do anything to keep from selling their house.

title: Man on the Edge
description: A desperate man threatens to jump from his hotel window.

title: If the Shoe Fits
description: An unemployed actor kills his twin brother and then assumes his identity-along with his wealth and beautiful wife. He finds out his brother had problems of his own.

title: The Mole
description: A psychiatrist claims a freed mental patient is homicidal.

title: Anniversary Gift
description: A cheating wife buys her husband a deadly snake.

title: The Impatient Patient
description: A cheerful hospital volunteer irritates a dying man.

title: When This Man Dies
description: A gambler begins receiving gifts of cash.

title: The Specialty of the House
description: An arrogant food critic meets his match in a restaurant owner who won't reveal a secret family recipe.

title: The Final Twist
description: Filmmakers take revenge on their domineering boss.

title: Tragedy Tonight
description: A woman practices her acting skills on her sister.

title: World's Oldest Motive
description: A meek man contracts to have his overbearing wife killed, then tries to stop it.

title: Deathmate
description: A woman asks her lover to killer her older, wealthy husband.

title: VCR - Very Careful Rape
description: A woman is raped while she is recording videotape message.

title: Animal Lovers
description: A woman thinks her dog was euthanized illegally.

title: Prism
description: Several women are suspects in a philandering lawyer's murder.

title: A Stolen Heart
description: A wealthy man pays 2 million dollars to be first in line for a heart transplant.

title: Houdini on Channel 4
description: A magician summons the spirit of Houdini to rescue his kidnapped niece.

title: Killer Takes All
description: Two elderly men make a life-insurance pact.

title: Hippocritic Oath
description: A failing medical student plans to use murder to graduate.

title: Prosecutor
description: A prosecutor pursues the death penalty in a homicide case.

title: If Looks Could Kill
description: A woman has plastic surgery to resemble a wealthy man's past love.

title: You'll Die Laughing
description: A comedian becomes obsessed with his fatal destiny.

title: Murder Party
description: A man is poisoned during a murder-themed birthday party at his mansion.

title: Twist
description: Thinking that his rich wife is dying, a man plans his future.

title: User Deadly
description: A detective facing retirement investigates a string of serial murders.

title: Career Move
description: A singer fakes suicide to boost his career.

title: Full Disclosure
description: A political reporter plans to write an expose.

title: Kandinsky's Vault
description: A man has a secret reason for refusing to sell his old bookstore.

title: There Was a Little Girl...
description: Tragedy ensnares a woman and her stepfather.

title: Twisted Sisters
description: A sorority president encounters tragedy when she tries to get revenge on a new member.

title: The 13th Floor
description: A developer who razes historic buildings is terrorized.

title: The Hunted: Part 1
description: A man holds a real estate agent hostage in an office and threatens to shoot people from the window.

title: The Hunted: Part 2
description: A sniper's hostage learns his motive.

title: Pen Pal
description: A murderer escapes from prison and seeks his pen pal, a teenage girl.

title: Ancient Voices
description: A man is jealous when his wife tries to contact her dead ex-husband.

title: Survival of the Fittest
description: An Englishman plays a survival game at home.

title: The Big Spin
description: A cab driver with a gambling habit has a lottery ticket worth a million dollars that can prove he murdered someone.

title: Don't Sell Yourself Short
description: Insider trading leads to murder and a double-cross.

title: For Art's Sake
description: An artist takes credit for his wife's work.

title: Murder in Mind
description: A writer imagines murder next door.

title: Mirror Mirror
description: A twin uses her sister's instability for seduction and murder.

title: Skeleton in the Closet
description: A rich couple shares a dark connection with Lizzie Borden.

title: In the Driver's Seat
description: An abrasive race driver has trouble adjusting to paralysis.

title: Driving Under the Influence
description: A drunk driver hits a pedestrian and leaves her for dead.

title: In the Name of Science
description: A scientist barters his freedom with a formula.

title: Romance Machine
description: An inventor of the future creates machines to improve his love life.

title: Diamonds Aren't Forever
description: A James Bond-type spy must retrieve a golden statue.

title: My Dear Watson
description: Sherlock Holmes and Inspector Lestrade seek kidnapped Dr. Watson.

title: Night Creatures
description: A reporter is drawn to a vampire-like rock star.

title: The Man Who Knew Too Little
description: A man wakes up in a hotel room, with amnesia.

title: Reunion
description: Seven Vietnam vets meet on the date of their leader's death.

title: South by Southeast
description: An actor is a victim of mistaken identity.
